function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cu 2 O/PU film can be removed by heavy deliberate scratching","Impact":"Loss of protective coating, potential exposure to contaminants","Mitigation":"Use more durable coating materials, implement regular inspection and maintenance","Technologies":"Durable polymer coatings, protective measures such as gloves, regular inspection and maintenance protocols","People":"Workers, maintenance personnel, stakeholders in the built environment","Owner":"Facility managers, maintenance personnel, stakeholders in the built environment"},{"Description":"Cationic polymer coatings did not speed inactivation of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Ineffective protection against SARS-CoV-2, potential risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Research and development of more effective antiviral coatings, implementation of additional protective measures","Technologies":"Antiviral polymer coatings, advanced testing for antiviral efficacy, additional protective measures such as PPE","People":"Occupants of the built environment, workers, stakeholders in public health","Owner":"Facility managers, public health organizations, stakeholders in the built environment"}]}
